Name: Swedish Blue Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A fruity, blue, vodka-laced concoction. Slightly sweet.
History: Created in 1999 by Timothy Schofield at Teatro Club in London, England
Nutrition: One serving of Swedish Blue Cocktail contains 224 calories
